content.rendered:
Jessica is a single mother who just wants to start a new life and raise her two beautiful children in peaceful conditions. One day, however, her violent ex-husband and his companion unexpectedly appear at her place, locking her in the chamber, from which there is apparently no way out.

Directed By D.J. Caruso

Written By Melanie Toast

Stars: Rainey Qualley. Jake Horowitz. Luciana VanDette
